name: Gadget Eats My Brain
description:
A simple game inspired by Singapore Heritage Game Jam 2022 with the theme "Renewal"

Control:

WASD or Arrow Keys to Move

Space or Z to Attack

You Play as a sentient droid, finding that gadgets have taken over humanity! It is up to you to fix the situation and save the planet!

Font: Super Mario 256 by fsuarez913 from Dafont.com
